thread.title_full: Wonder Woman takes centre stage on Total Film's Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice cover - Movies News - Digital Spy

author: Tasha Hegarty
title: Wonder Woman takes centre stage on Total Film's Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice cover - Movies
text: Wonder Woman is at the centre of the title heroes in Total Film's Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice cover.Henry Cavill finally joined the world of social media and, to celebrate, posted the December cover of the magazine.(function(d, s, id) { var js, fjs = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0]; if (d.getElementById(id)) return; js = d.createElement(s); js.id = id; js.src = "//connect.facebook.net/en_GB/sdk.js#xfbml=1&version=v2.3"; fjs.parentNode.insertBefore(js, fjs);}(document, 'script', 'facebook-jssdk'));So I've finally taken the leap into social media! And here's a little treat for you all in the form of a sneak peak of...Posted by Henry Cavill on Wednesday, 21 October 2015 Not a lot is known about the plot of Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice, but some tidbits have been revealed."I can't give too much away, but I'm coming into a scene and Batman and Superman are both in the scene, so I can say that," Amy Adams recently told The Hollywood Reporter."And it was just fun. Because they had been working together for a couple weeks and just running it, seeing this dynamic. © Warner Bros. "I'll talk about this when we're promoting the movie and we can tell more. But there were definitely funny moments involving bat-suits and such."Michael Shannon also revealed General Zod will have a few lines to say."Yeah, I say some stuff. But not a whole lot! I mean, I am dead," he explained. © Warner Bros. "I'm just like a ghost. It's kind of like Russell Crowe in the first one. Jor-El. For some reason, these Kryptonian spirits, they linger. Even once you crack my neck, you can't shut me up."Alongside Cavill as Superman, Ben Affleck as Batman and Gal Gadot as Wonder Woman, the film also stars Jesse Eisenberg as Lex Luthor and Diane Lane as Martha Kent.Watch a trailer below: function onTemplateLoaded(experienceID) { bcExp = brightcove.getExperience(experienceID); modVP = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.VIDEO_PLAYER); modExp = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.EXPERIENCE); modCon = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.CONTENT); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.BEGIN, onVideoStart); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.STOP, onVideoStop); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.PROGRESS, onVideoProgress); } #_containermyExperience4351362182001 { height: 100%; } // InSkin integration parameters: InSkinParams['myInSkin14351362182001'] = { 'srv_SectionID': '', 'srv_SectionIDPlay': '123757', 'srv_Keywords': '', 'plr_ContentID': 'myExperience4351362182001', 'plr_ContentType': 'BRIGHTCOVE3', 'plr_ContentW': 558, 'plr_ContentH': 314, 'plr_NoSkinContentResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinContentW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinContentH': 348, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinH': 348, 'plr_ResizeOnHideSkin': true, 'plr_HideSkinOnExternalAd': 'all', 'plr_ShowSkinAfterExternalAd': true, 'cnt_SmartPlayer': true }; // create the InSkin object: var InSkinObject4351362182001 = new InSkin.Base('myInSkin14351362182001'); brightcove.createExperiences(); if (!navigator.userAgent.match(/Android/i)) { InSkinObject4351362182001.init(); ai_type="video"; }
